text: Find power point files drive letter cd /mnt/g; find . -name "*.pptx" list long format cd /mnt/g; find . -name "*.pptx" -ls find R files changes last 4 months find . -name "*.R" ! -ctime +120 Find R files accessed last 4 month 3 months ago list files long format find . -name "*.R" ! -atime +120 -atime +90 -exec ls -l {} +
